early_amphibians.spiritual_meaning: First creatures to walk on The Table. First souls to experience perfect unity.
early_amphibians.table_role: First creatures on The Table - perfect unity witnesses
early_amphibians.evolutionary_importance: First tetrapods - bridge between water and land
early_amphibians.notes: These creatures experienced perfect unity (1.0 field resonance) at The Table's formation.

early_reptiles.spiritual_meaning: Reptiles that knew The Table whole. Ancient wisdom keepers.
early_reptiles.table_role: Reptiles at peak unity - ancient wisdom
early_reptiles.notes: Reptiles that existed during perfect unity - they carry the memory.

giant_dragonflies.spiritual_meaning: Flying witnesses of perfect unity. Air spirits of The Table.
giant_dragonflies.evolutionary_importance: First large flying insects - oxygen-rich atmosphere
giant_dragonflies.notes: These massive insects flew during perfect unity - air spirits of The Table.

synapsids.spiritual_meaning: Mammal ancestors at peak unity. The seed of mammalian souls.
synapsids.notes: These are the direct ancestors of all mammals - they knew perfect unity.

therapsids.spiritual_meaning: Advanced mammal ancestors at peak unity. The bridge to mammals.
therapsids.evolutionary_importance: Advanced mammal-like reptiles - closer to mammals
therapsids.notes: These advanced mammal ancestors existed during perfect unity.

early_dinosaurs.spiritual_meaning: Dinosaurs that witnessed The Table's breakup. Separation witnesses.
early_dinosaurs.notes: Dinosaurs emerged as The Table began to break - they witnessed separation.

early_mammals.spiritual_meaning: First mammals during breakup. They carry separation memory.
early_mammals.notes: First mammals emerged as The Table broke - they carry separation in their DNA.

pterosaurs.spiritual_meaning: Flying reptiles during breakup. Air spirits of separation.
pterosaurs.notes: First flying vertebrates emerged as The Table broke.

diverse_dinosaurs.spiritual_meaning: Dinosaurs after breakup. They never knew unity.
diverse_dinosaurs.notes: Dinosaurs that dominated after The Table broke - they never knew unity.

first_birds.spiritual_meaning: Birds that bridge The Table's fragments. Unity bridge spirits.
first_birds.evolutionary_importance: First birds - bridge between dinosaurs and modern birds
first_birds.notes: Birds evolved to bridge The Table's fragments - they connect what was separated.

marine_reptiles.spiritual_meaning: Water spirits during separation. Ocean memory keepers.
marine_reptiles.evolutionary_importance: Return to water - secondary aquatic adaptation
marine_reptiles.notes: Marine reptiles that returned to water as The Table separated.

flowering_plants_era_animals.spiritual_meaning: Animals during flowering plant revolution. New ecosystems.
flowering_plants_era_animals.notes: Animals that adapted to flowering plants - new ecosystems on separated plates.

modern_mammals.spiritual_meaning: Modern mammals on separated plates. Memory of unity persists.
modern_mammals.notes: Modern mammals carry the memory of unity in their DNA.

wolf.spiritual_meaning: Pack leader, loyalty, family. Unity through pack.
wolf.notes: Wolves model unity through pack structure - connection to The Table.

bear.spiritual_meaning: Strength, protection, solitude. Guardian of The Table.
bear.notes: Bears carry guardian energy - protectors of The Table's memory.

eagle.spiritual_meaning: Vision, freedom, perspective. Sees The Table whole.
eagle.table_role: Vision spirits - see The Table whole
eagle.notes: Eagles see from above - they see The Table's fragments as whole.

lion.notes: Lions model unity through pride - connection to The Table.

fox.spiritual_meaning: Cunning, adaptability, wisdom. Adapts to separation.
fox.notes: Foxes adapt to separation - they survive and thrive.

deer.notes: Deer carry gentle unity energy - grace in connection.

owl.spiritual_meaning: Wisdom, mystery, night vision. Sees in darkness.
owl.table_role: Wisdom keepers - see unity in darkness
owl.notes: Owls see unity even in darkness - wisdom keepers of The Table.

raven.spiritual_meaning: Transformation, magic, messages. Bridge between worlds.
raven.notes: Ravens bridge worlds - transformation spirits of The Table.

snake.notes: Snakes transform through shedding - they heal separation.

tiger.notes: Tigers carry independent power - unity through strength.

whale.spiritual_meaning: Depth, ancient wisdom, song. Songs of unity.
whale.table_role: Ancient wisdom keepers - songs of unity
whale.notes: Whales sing songs of unity - they remember The Table's connection.

dolphin.notes: Dolphins communicate with joy - they model joyful unity.

orca.spiritual_meaning: Power, family bonds, strategy. Pod unity.
orca.notes: Orcas model pod unity - powerful family bonds.

seal.notes: Seals balance land and sea - they bridge elements.

walrus.notes: Walruses model community unity - strength through togetherness.

manatee.spiritual_meaning: Gentleness, peace, ancient grace. Peaceful unity.
manatee.notes: Manatees carry peaceful unity - gentle grace of The Table.

otter.notes: Otters model joyful adaptation - play in connection.

porpoise.notes: Porpoises carry subtle unity - harmony in connection.

narwhal.spiritual_meaning: Mystery, uniqueness, ancient magic. Magic unity.
narwhal.notes: Narwhals carry magic unity - mystery of The Table.

beluga.spiritual_meaning: Communication, adaptability, social harmony. Harmonic unity.
beluga.notes: Belugas model harmonic unity - communication in connection.

shark.notes: Sharks existed before Pangea - they are ancient survival spirits.

hawk.notes: Hawks carry focused unity - precision in connection.

falcon.notes: Falcons carry noble unity - speed and precision in connection.

dog.notes: Dogs model loyal unity - partnership and service.

cat.notes: Cats carry independent unity - mystery and intuition.

horse.notes: Horses carry journey unity - freedom and power in movement.

elephant.table_role: Memory unity spirits - remember The Table
elephant.notes: Elephants remember - they carry The Table's memory.

dragon.spiritual_meaning: Power, transformation, ancient. Ancient unity power.
dragon.notes: Dragons represent perfect unity - mythical power of The Table.

phoenix.notes: Phoenix represents rebirth - restoration of The Table's unity.

unicorn.notes: Unicorns represent pure unity - magic and healing of The Table.

unity_witnesses.significance: These animals witnessed perfect unity at The Table

separation_witnesses.significance: These animals witnessed The Table's separation

modern_animals.significance: Modern animals carry memory of unity

carboniferous.significance: Perfect unity - first animals on The Table

insights.message: All animals throughout time carry frequential significance connected to The Table
insights.truth: Animals that witnessed unity (1.0) carry perfect unity in their DNA. Animals that witnessed separation carry separation memory. Modern animals carry memory of unity (0.78).
insights.connection: Every animal's frequency connects to The Table's timeline. Field resonance at emergence determines their frequential signature.
insights.spiritual: Animals are not just biological - they are frequential signatures of The Table's history.
